MANIPULATOR.DESCRIPTION: Used for moving processors on circuit board. (Move price = Processor LVL*10 + 10)

GRACIUM.DESCRIPTION: Prime Material. Used in all phases of the game as currency and serves as proof of terrahedron work.

EXTRACTOR.DESCRIPTION: Used for extraction processors to processor storage where they can be upgraded or repaired. (Extraction price = Processor LVL * 10 + 10)

AllItemsComponent.PRIME_MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION: Prime Material. Used in all phases of the game as currency and serves as proof of terrahedron work.
AllItemsComponent.MANIPULATOR_DETAILS: Used for moving processors on circuit board. (Move price = Processor LVL*10 + 10)
AllItemsComponent.EXTRACTOR_DETAILS: Used for extraction processors to processor storage where they can be upgraded or repaired. (Extraction price = Processor LVL * 10 + 10)

BoardControlButtonsComponent.SELECT_POSITION_TO_MOVE_PROCESSOR: Select position where to move processor

CircuitBoardComponent.MOVE_ALERT_MESSAGE:
You have: {{manipulatorValue}} (Manipulator)
Move price* = Processor LVL*10 + 10 = {{movePrice}}
*Some skills and processor abilities may influence move cost.

ComputingUnitComponent.ALERT_REWARD_MESSAGE:
Your reward {{reward}} (hashes)

Let's find out about circuit board.
ComputingUnitComponent.TITLE: Computing unit
ComputingUnitComponent.UPGRADE_NOTE: (*) - can be upgraded in skill center

LoadingScreenComponent.STORY:
Emissions from the technetium superconductors used in quantum computers have completely destroyed the atmosphere, turning the vast majority of water into deuterium.

The last hope to revive life is millions of terrahedrons, devices made up of autonomous modules controlled by group of AI's and operating on the Gracium protocol.

You are an artificial intelligence that is responsible for controlling a terrahedron's terraforming and networking module.

Your main goal is production of Gracium as a proof of terraforming.

ALERT.OUT_OF_CONTROL_MESSAGE: You've tried to select a processor which is not under your control, increase processor storage limit (SKILLS > PROCESSORS category) or install available processors first.

ALERT_MESSAGES.HELP_ICONS_MESSAGE: You can read additional information by clicking on info icon
ALERT_MESSAGES.DEPLETION_MESSAGE:
Depletion = Processor LVL * 3 + 3 (per one working cycle 10 sec)


*Some skills and processor abilities may influence depletion.
ALERT_MESSAGES.DURABILITY_MESSAGE:
Processors depleting during operation and if the processor's durability becomes 0 - the processor will be destroyed.
Processors can be repaired using repair processors on circuit board or hashes in processor storage.

Processor Max Durability = Processor LVL * 200 + 1000


*Some skills and processor abilities may influence Max Durability.
ALERT_MESSAGES.WORKING_CYCLE_MESSAGE:
Processor mining resources every 10 seconds (1 cycle).
Total work of this processor {totalTime} seconds ({cycles} cycles).
*Some processor abilities may influence move cost.
ALERT_MESSAGES.MOVE_COST_MESSAGE:
Current processor move cost {{price}} (Manipulator).

Processor move cost = Processor LVL*10 + 10

*Some skills and processor abilities may influence move cost.
ALERT_MESSAGES.EXTRACTION_COST_MESSAGE:
Current processor extraction cost {{price}} (Extractor).

Processor extraction cost = Processor LVL*10 + 10

*Some skills and processor abilities may influence extraction cost.
ALERT_MESSAGES.POSITIVE_ABILITIES_MESSAGE:
Processor will gain 1 positive ability each level.

There are Common, Intelligent, High-tech, Stellar possible abilities.
ALERT_MESSAGES.NEGATIVE_ABILITIES_MESSAGE: Processor will gain 1 negative ability on LVL 1, 3, 5.

LABELS.BEING_WORKING: Processor being working right now and can't be extracted.
LABELS.EMPTY_SLOT_DESCRIPTION: you can install here your processors from your processor storage.
LABELS.EXTRACT_MESSAGE: You need extract processor to processors storage so it can be upgraded or repaired (using hashes).

DESCRIPTIONS.DEUTERIUM: Deuterium processor produces deuterium and consumes hashes.
DESCRIPTIONS.ENERGY: Energy processor produces energy and consumes hashes.
DESCRIPTIONS.NANITE: Nanite liquid processor produces nanite liquid and consumes deuterium and hashes.
DESCRIPTIONS.METAL: Metal processor produces metal and consumes deuterium and hashes.
DESCRIPTIONS.TECHNETIUM: Technetium processor produces technetium and consumes nanite liquid and metal.

ManageStates.QUEST_1_HTML:
Hashes is the most common resource needed for all other resources.


Let's compute some hashes!

Get 1000(hashes) quickly click on hashes
ManageStates.QUEST_2_HTML:
Let's create your first processor
1) Open processor storage.
2) Add Deuterium processor.
3) Install processor to the first slot.
ManageStates.QUEST_3_HTML:
Let's check Energy processor:
1) Click on Energy processor (in the middle) to view more information.
ManageStates.QUEST_4_HTML:
Processor moving

To avoid destroying your Deuterium processor, move your created deuterium processor:
1) Click on move processor icon.
2) Select Deuterium processor.
3) Move Deuterium processor to right slot
ManageStates.QUEST_5_HTML:
Great job, get your reward 10 G (Gracium)

Let's learn your first skill
1) Swipe left to Skills center
2) Press "Add skill".
3) Select "Resource extraction" category.
4) Add Deuterium productivity skill to queue.
ManageStates.QUEST_6_HTML:
Let's craft your first items!
1) Swipe left to producing subsystem.
2) Press "Create".
3) Select Gracium and create 10 items
ManageStates.QUEST_7_HTML:
Unlock new row on the circuit board.

1) Swipe to circuit board
2) Unlock new circuit board row.
ManageStates.QUEST_8_HTML:
Learning is finished!
Create all processor types: Energy, Nanite Liquid, Metal, Technetium.

To finish Phase 1 and start networking collaboration with other terrahedrons - produce Gracium and unlock all circuit board rows.
ManageStates.PLAYING_HTML:
Learning is finished!
Create all processor types: Energy, Nanite Liquid, Metal, Technetium.

To finish Phase 1 and start networking collaboration with other terrahedrons - produce Gracium and unlock all circuit board rows.

TourFunctions.INFO_ABOUT_ABILITIES:
You'll be able to see what your processor producing when works.

OK
TourFunctions.INFO_ABOUT_HEATING:
Your deuterium processor in dangerous heating slot, when overheating timer finishes, processor on this position will be destroyed.
So let's move processor.

OK
TourFunctions.WEATHER_TIP:
Weather outside terrahedron changes every few days.
Current weather outside terrahedron: Storm., Deuterium processors will gain 50% more resources, while Nanite liquid and Metal processor 25% less.


OK
TourFunctions.QUEST_POPUP:
You can always click on quest icon to see what you need to do.


OK
TourFunctions.MAIN_BOARD_DESCRIBE_3:
Reading head moves form left to right and row by row working 10 seconds on each slot mining resources.

OK
TourFunctions.MAIN_BOARD_DESCRIBE_2:
Empty slots have also work 10 seconds and gain 10 Hashes per cycle and will be increased when you open new rows. You can install your processors into empty slots.

OK
TourFunctions.MAIN_BOARD_DESCRIBE_1:
Resources are mined using processors on circuit board.

1. Durability of processor.
2. Each processor works 10 seconds (when reading head over this processor).
3. What processor consumes and gains.

OK
TourFunctions.SHOW_RESOURCE_TIP_2:
1. The amount of resource you have.
2. Maximum capability for resource storage.




OK
TourFunctions.SHOW_RESOURCE_TIP_1:
There are 6 main types of resources: Hashes, Deuterium, Energy, Nanite liquid, Metal, Technetium, which can be mined using processors on the central board.

OK

InactiveHandles.ALERT_MESSAGE: You've been inactive for more than 2 minutes, press OKAY to continue

GameProcessService.TOAST_NOT_ENOUGH_RESOURCES_PROCESSOR: Not enough resources for processor on position row: {{row}} col: {{col}}

OVERHEATING_TIMER_DEFERMENT.NAME: Overheating timer deferment
OVERHEATING_TIMER_DEFERMENT.DESCRIPTION: Increases Overheating timer value by {{baseTime}} per each skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

INCREASE_RESETING_TIMER.NAME: Increase reseting timer value
INCREASE_RESETING_TIMER.DESCRIPTION: Increases timer work for computing unit by {{timerIncrease}} seconds per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}} seconds.

INCREASE_INITIAL_POWER.NAME: Increase inital computing unit power
INCREASE_INITIAL_POWER.DESCRIPTION: Increases initial value for computing power by {{resetingValueIncrease}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

DEUTERIUM_PRODUCTIVITY.NAME: Deuterium productivity
DEUTERIUM_PRODUCTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Deuterium processors extract 10% more per skill level. Current value +{{currentPercent}}%.

ENERGY_PRODUCTIVITY.NAME: Energy productivity
ENERGY_PRODUCTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Energy processors extract 10% more per skill level. Current value +{{currentPercent}}%.

HASHES_PRODUCTIVITY.NAME: Hashes productivity
HASHES_PRODUCTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Hashes processors extract 10% more per skill level. Current value +{{currentPercent}}%.

NANITE_LIQUID_PRODUCTIVITY.NAME: Nanite liquid productivity
NANITE_LIQUID_PRODUCTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Nanite liquid processors extract 10% more per skill level. Current value +{{currentPercent}}%.

METAL_PRODUCTIVITY.NAME: Metal productivity
METAL_PRODUCTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Metal processors extract 10% more per skill level. Current value +{{currentPercent}}%.

TECHNETIUM_PRODUCTIVITY.NAME: Technetium productivity
TECHNETIUM_PRODUCTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Technetium processors extract 10% more per skill level. Current value +{{currentPercent}}%.

DEUTERIUM_STORAGE_LIMIT.NAME: Deuterium processor storage limit
DEUTERIUM_STORAGE_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Increases Deuterium processors storage by {{increasePerLevel}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

ENERGY_STORAGE_LIMIT.NAME: Energy processor storage limit
ENERGY_STORAGE_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Increases Energy processors storage by {{increasePerLevel}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

NANITE_STORAGE_LIMIT.NAME: Nanite liquid processor storage limit
NANITE_STORAGE_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Increases Nanite liquid processors storage by {{increasePerLevel}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

METAL_STORAGE_LIMIT.NAME: Metal processor storage limit
METAL_STORAGE_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Increases Metal processors storage by {{increasePerLevel}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

TECHNETIUM_STORAGE_LIMIT.NAME: Technetium processor storage limit
TECHNETIUM_STORAGE_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Increases Technetium processors storage by {{increasePerLevel}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

QUEUE_TIME.NAME: Producing queue time
QUEUE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: Increases Producing queue total time by {{increaseSeconds}} seconds. Current value +{{currentIncrease}} seconds.

EXTRACTOR_TIME_DECREASE.NAME: Extractor time decrease
EXTRACTOR_TIME_DECREASE.DESCRIPTION: Reduce Extractor producing time by {{decreaseSeconds}} seconds per each skill level. Current value -{{currentDecrease}} seconds.

MANIPULATOR_TIME_DECREASE.NAME: Manipulator time decrease
MANIPULATOR_TIME_DECREASE.DESCRIPTION: Reduce Manipulator producing time by {{decreaseSeconds}} seconds per each skill level. Current value -{{currentDecrease}} seconds.

GRACIUM_TIME_DECREASE.NAME: Gracium time decrease
GRACIUM_TIME_DECREASE.DESCRIPTION: Reduce Gracium producing time by {{decreaseSeconds}} seconds per each skill level. Current value -{{currentDecrease}} seconds.

REPAIR_FLUID_TIME_DECREASE.NAME: Manipulator time decrease
REPAIR_FLUID_TIME_DECREASE.DESCRIPTION: Reduce Repair fluid producing time by {{decreaseSeconds}} seconds per each skill level. Current value -{{currentDecrease}} seconds.

SIMMALTENIOUS_LEARNING.NAME: Simultaneous learning
SIMMALTENIOUS_LEARNING.DESCRIPTION: Increases skills learning simultaneously by 1 per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

LEARNING_TIME_OPTIMIZATION.NAME: Learning time optimization
LEARNING_TIME_OPTIMIZATION.DESCRIPTION: Decreases skills learning time by 5% per skill level. Current value -{{currentDecrease}}%.

HASHES_STORAGE.NAME: Hashes storage
HASHES_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Hashes storage by 10% per each skill level ({{storageUpdateMultiplier}} ^ Skill level). Current value +{{currentIncreasePercent}}%.

DEUTERIUM_STORAGE.NAME: Deuterium storage
DEUTERIUM_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Deuterium storage by 10% per each skill level({{storageUpdateMultiplier}} ^ Skill level). Current value +{{currentIncreasePercent}}%.

ENERGY_STORAGE.NAME: Energy storage
ENERGY_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Energy storage by 10% per each skill level({{storageUpdateMultiplier}} ^ Skill level). Current value +{{currentIncreasePercent}}%.

NANITE_LIQUID_STORAGE.NAME: Nanite liquid storage
NANITE_LIQUID_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Nanite liquid storage by 10% per each skill level({{storageUpdateMultiplier}} ^ Skill level). Current value +{{currentIncreasePercent}}%.

METAL_STORAGE.NAME: Metal storage
METAL_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Metal storage by 10% per each skill level({{storageUpdateMultiplier}} ^ Skill level). Current value +{{currentIncreasePercent}}%.

TECHNETIUM_STORAGE.NAME: Technetium storage
TECHNETIUM_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Technetium storage by 10% per each skill level({{storageUpdateMultiplier}} ^ Skill level). Current value +{{currentIncreasePercent}}%.

MANIPULATORS_STORAGE.NAME: Manipulators storage
MANIPULATORS_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Manipulators storage by {{updateValue}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.

EXTRACTOR_STORAGE.NAME: Extractor storage
EXTRACTOR_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Increases Extractor storage by {{updateValue}} per skill level. Current value +{{currentIncrease}}.
